name: Blaze
description: Blaze is a mythical fire dog born from ancient flames, representing strength, passion, and relentless drive. Built on the Base blockchain, Blaze combines meme culture with powerful community energy to ignite a new wave of decentralized engagement. The project aims to unite holders through shared mythology, lore, and on-chain interaction, creating a blazing symbol of resilience in Web3. Blaze aims to raise awareness for Rottweilers and dogs worldwide!
